Both are classic romantic dramas that feature beautiful settings, well-written scripts, and excellent performances by the cast. "The Yearling" is a heartwarming tale about a young boy named Tom who grows up in rural Pennsylvania during the 1870s. Tom's parents have recently passed away, leaving Tom to live with his older sister, a very headstrong woman named Maria.
Despite their differences, Tom and Maria come to realize that they share many common interests and passions, including music, sports, and nature.
As Tom and Maria spend more time together, they begin to develop feelings of attraction and affection towards each other.
